_header: When Maria the mother of Jesu
_description: Gospel, ‘In vigilia Nativitatis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Whon Maria þe Modur of IhesuWas spoused to Ioseph bi
                    vertu…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat he euere wiþ vs dwelleÞe Trinite hol
                    þat herwede helle. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Cum esset desponsata mater Ihesu Maria (f.
                    170va)

Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.

                poet.a.1,

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
